mapper.update: update company_dot set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_area_id = #{companyAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banner = #{banner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_time = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, m_time = #{mTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, company_id, company_area_id, name, address, tel, banner, c_time, m_time, seq from company_dot where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
